Development Team","details":"Integrates with AutomatedHospitalRegistry for verification status  Key Features: - Full profile storage (type, address, city, phone, PIC info) - Hospital-controlled CRUD operations - Public read access for transparency - Enumeration support (list all, filter by city) - ERC-2771 Meta-Transaction Support (Gasless Transactions)  Data Flow: 1. Hospital registers via AutomatedHospitalRegistry (name, license, verified) 2. Hospital calls setProfile() to store complete profile data 3.
